Grazie per aver scelto Candy simply-Fi.
Aggiorniamo regolarmente l’applicazione per renderla sempre migliore e introdurre nuove funzionalità.
Scarica la versione più recente per avere tutte le funzioni più aggiornate. In questa release:
•Minor bug fixing

Thank you for downloading Candy simply-Fi.
We update our app regularly so we can make it better for you and introduce new functions.
Get the latest version for all the available features. In this release:
- Restyling of the graphic interface for Bianca washing machines and washer-dryers with new features (Visual Tips, Guided Washing, Weather Tips, Favorites Section and Most Used Cycles)
- New Timeless ovens integration with updated interface and over 200 new recipes
- Minor bug fixing

Thank you for downloading Candy simply Fi.
We update our app regularly so we can make it better for you and introduce new functions.
Get the latest version for all the available features. In this release:

New Rapidò washing machines and washer-dryers integration with Snap & Wash, Talking Candy voice control, remote management, Guided Washing, Statistics and Reports, Smart Washing Reminders, Visual Tips and much more!

New Smart-Pro washing machines and washer-dryers integration with Guided Washing, Statistics, Smart Washing Reminders and much more!

Bianca app update with improvement of the Favorites section, introduction of Smart reminders, new setting of the cycles, estimated residual time and more! If you already have a Candy Bianca washing machine or washer-dryer, we suggest you to Logout from the simply-Fi App and then Login again, in order to take advantage of all the new features. At the new Login, insert the same user id (email and password) of the Simply-Fi profile that you previously used, without registering again your appliance in the App or creating a new profile.

On boarding integration to help you to discover and use the new features on Bianca, Rapidò e Smart-Pro washing machines and washer-dryers

Added Calendar to Inventory Assistant in Refrigerators section

New user interface and Direct Cook function integration in the hobs section

Minor bug fixing

Thank you for downloading Candy simply-Fi App.
We update our app regularly so we can make it better for you and introduce new functions.
Get the latest version for all the available features. In this release:
It's now possible to enable Snap & Wash function even with disabled remote control or washing machine off
